text: Daniel is a software engineer with over 14 years of experience designing and deploying large-scale, mission-critical systems. He currently works on high-availability services and telephony solutions for autonomous vehicles at Cruise.

Before that, he worked at a series of fintech startups, focusing on payment integrations, crypto infrastructure, and compliance-driven development. Outside of engineering, he enjoys traveling with his wife, distance running across the city, and bouldering.
